data.actual_result: The categorys name go through the + breaking it
data.expected_result: The categorys name should touch / go through the + for creating new channels
data.short_description: Making a category with a long name, make the name go through the + for creating new channels
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server where you can create categories - Make a category with a long name (use max characters limit of you want); save - Go back to channels list and observe the categories name: it goes through the + for creating new channels in that category - (optional see the attachment)
